rename.from: Yii::t translation ignored when using params returned from method calls
rename.to: Yii::t call is ignored at extraction when the message is using params returned from method calls

rename.to: message/extract ignores Yii::t calls when the message is using params returned from method calls

issue.title: Fixes #17098: fixed message/extract when using message params returned from method calls

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | yes
| New feature?  | no
| Breaks BC?    | no
| Tests pass?   | yes
| Fixed issues  | #17098

body: @uran1980, @fl0v would you please try fix @rugabarbo did?

it works in my scenario, 
great job @rugabarbo,
10x

PS: imho the code complexity in there is pretty high, i wouldn't be surprised if other scenarios will still uncover bugs in the future.
@fl0v I agree. The complexity there is quite bad.

Guys, if we want to reduce the complexity, the whole method `\yii\console\controllers\MessageController::extractMessagesFromTokens` should be refactored:

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/c64152d01424f734315bb58b95e2dfd4e2ef7147/framework/console/controllers/MessageController.php#L491-L580

I propose to postpone this task for the future. Now it is more important to release minor release **2.0.16.1** with critical fixes.

What doesn't work for me is extracting this:

```
echo Html::tag('div', Yii::t('app', 'Theoretically the subscription with {licences} would approximately expire on {date}.', ['licences' => Html::tag('strong', Yii::t('app', '{delta, plural, =1{# license} other{# licenses}}', ['delta' => $flash['count']])), 'date' => Html::tag('strong', Yii::$app->formatter->asDate($flash['date'], 'long'))]));
```

It's not the first translation in the file, but the last one before this extracts just fine. It USED to work before.
@rugabarbo would you please check this extra case?
